main.name: Divesh Singh
main.description: I do freelance project development like website, mobile app and other contract based development work.
main.bio: I am a Full stack developer with 2 years+ experince. I build Website, mobile application (both android and ios) for small buisness. I am also open to contract based development projects.
main.contactmessage: Send message for a project or any other query and I will get back to you at the email you will provide as fast as I can.
